page.title: 15Children's Games (2)
page.content: Here is another game children play at {Elmhurst Junior School. { Jelly on the plate Jelly on the plate is a skipping game.3 to 10 people can play this game You start playing the game with two people turning a long rope.The first person jumps in and starts jumping over the rope.The other people sing the rhyme.This is how the rhyme goes to the skipping game. {Jelly on the plate,jelly on the {plate wibble,wobble,wibble,wobble {jelly on the plate.Six pence on the {floor,six pence on the floor, pick it {up,pick it up,six pence on the floor. {Ice_cream on the floor,ice_cream on {the floor,lick it up,lick it up, {ice_cream on the floor.Burglar in {the house,burglar in the house,kick {him out,kick him out,burglar in the } {house.
